about me

Hello, I am Chidiebere Ezeokwelume and I am a web developer. I live in Lagos, Nigeria. I so much enjoy coding and the challenge of learning something new everyday.

I like exploring the latest and the greatest technologies as they launch, and that way, it keeps me excited and motivated.

I have built so many projects using JavaScript and React (with so many other frameworks)

You can also find me on Github
